name: nspin

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Indicates the spin component of the wave function, related to the structure of the HR file. 1: regardless of spin. 2: the wave function is divided into two groups, one group is all up and one group is all down. 4: the wave function has both up and down components. Default : No default value

description: Indicates the spin component of the wave function, related to the structure of the HR file. 1: regardless of spin. 2: the wave function is divided into two groups, one group is all up and one group is all down. 4: the wave function has both up and down components. Default : No default value

name: package

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Indicates data sources for HR, SR, rR. Default : ABACUS

description: Indicates data sources for HR, SR, rR. Default : ABACUS

name: fermi_energy

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: Indicates the Fermi energy of the system. When set to Auto, the FERMI_ENERGY function needs to be added. Default : Auto

description: Indicates the Fermi energy of the system. When set to Auto, the FERMI_ENERGY function needs to be added. Default : Auto

arguments.name: value

name: initial_threshold

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: The energy unit is eV. In the initial grid, only the k-points whose band differences are less than the threshold can enter the search for the next round of degenerate points. Default : 0.1

description: The energy unit is eV. In the initial grid, only the k-points whose band differences are less than the threshold can enter the search for the next round of degenerate points. Default : 0.1

name: adaptive_grid

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: The refined grid will refine the k-points that reach the initial_threshold in the initial grid. There are three parameters. Default : 20 20 20

description: The refined grid will refine the k-points that reach the initial_threshold in the initial grid. There are three parameters. Default : 20 20 20

name: adaptive_threshold

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: The minimum difference considered in independent bands, the energy unit is eV. This means if the band gap is below this bar, it will be recognized as degenerate bands. Default : 0.001

name: eta

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: When calculating the Berry curvature using the Kubo formula, the energy difference in the denominator is modified as \( E_{n\mathbf{k}} - E_{m\mathbf{k}} \to E_{n\mathbf{k}} - E_{m\mathbf{k}} + i\eta \) to avoid numerical issues caused by degeneracy. Default : 0.01

description: When calculating the Berry curvature using the Kubo formula, the energy difference in the denominator is modified as \( E_{n\mathbf{k}} - E_{m\mathbf{k}} \to E_{n\mathbf{k}} - E_{m\mathbf{k}} + i\eta \) to avoid numerical issues caused by degeneracy. Default : 0.01
